translation1: "Today, let's take a look at some \"strange hot searches.\" What is considered normal public opinion? Let's randomly select three hot searches: \"February 2nd, two dragons lift their heads,\" \"Good-looking Friends Rise in Price,\" and \"AliExpress Event.\" Public opinion spreads and forms a wave, and then the index drops (a smooth curve) and eventually dissipates. If there is a secondary wave of public opinion, there may be a small \"camel peak\" that reappears.They look exactly the same as the \"Internet Public Opinion Evolution Model\" displayed on the official website of the Cyberspace Administration of China. What is abnormal public opinion? By randomly selecting six hot searches from the same event, it presents the characteristics of \"peak shape\", \"sawtooth shape\", and \"cliff shape\".[Peak shape] refers to human-induced heating, quickly climbing the hot search rankings and attracting widespread attention; [Sawtooth shape] refers to periodic heating, ensuring that the topic remains on the hot search rankings; [Cliff shape] refers to collective withdrawal, with the hot search fulfilling its \"function\" and moving on to a new task or battlefield. In Figure 9, the peak of heat for one event coincides with the trough of another event, with only a few seconds difference, indicating that the unified red army has been assigned a new task and launched a new round of attacks. The professionalism of the black publicity is evident: for dozens of hot searches simultaneously ranking on the list, which ones attract attention, which ones are responsible for popularization, which ones provoke public opinion, which ones divert attention, which ones affect cognition, which ones mislead judgement, which ones stimulate emotions, and which ones influence decision-making. The black publicity accounts are divided into batches and targeted at different nodes, almost considering all factors in the spread of public opinion.Propagation is a science, putting aside personal stances and emotions, public relations will also disappear without a trace when faced with objective data. Every action leaves a trace, and we will uncover these traces together. Data source: Time Machine Hot Search."

However, overall the text is coherent, has a clear narrative, and is grammatically correct. translation1: "Taking a foot bath and getting an electric shock from the bubbles? Choosing the right foot bath basin can have excellent therapeutic and health effects on the feet. Today, the editor of Jumei will answer this question and hope to help friends. With the enhancement of people's health awareness, foot bath basins are becoming more and more popular among consumers, and a large number of products with different specifications have emerged in the market, providing consumers with a wide range of choices, from more than 100 yuan to thousands of yuan.In related data, compared with traditional home appliances, sales of health-related home appliances such as foot bath basins are booming, but foot bath basins do not have a dedicated industry standard, so there is a certain safety risk. \"It's too dangerous to soak your feet in electric water!\" Mr. Li told reporters. Recently, he bought a foot bath basin as a birthday gift for his father, but his father felt numbness in his feet when soaking.Mr. Li initially thought it was caused by the vibration function of the foot bath, but he didn't expect that even after turning off the vibration function, his father still felt a tingling sensation on the soles of his feet. Mr. Li tried using a pen, and surprisingly, the pen lit up. Mr. Li discovered that the water in the foot bath was conducting electricity. Later, he contacted the merchant, and the merchant's attitude was not bad, even though he returned the foot bath, Mr. Li still felt unhappy.Because he found that this popular foot bath basin has no clear and detailed industry regulations in terms of applicable population, materials guaranteeing safety at the highest temperature setting, etc. However, generally speaking, foot bath basins do not have electrical problems, but it cannot be ruled out that some products may not have been strictly controlled during production. Therefore, when purchasing, choose a modular foot bath basin.Water and electricity are separated, and there is no safety hazard. You can test it with an electric pen at will."

translation1: "Educational News: Beijing Reduces the Proportion of Special Students Admitted to Junior High Schools in Early 2016 - Xinhua Net, January 21st and 22nd. The examination for special students applying for junior high schools in Beijing was organized and implemented by the education committees of each district. This year, all districts in Beijing have reduced the proportion of special students admitted, making the competition for special students even more intense.Taking the Dongcheng District as an example, the ratio of primary school students with special talents in sports, arts, and science who are admitted to middle school this year does not exceed 5% of the total planned enrollment in the district. The planned enrollment is 380 people, and the attendance rate does not exceed 10% of the school's planned enrollment. Students with sports, arts, and science talents who have applied online are eligible to participate in the selection of special talent students. To facilitate students to participate in the examination nearby, the Dongcheng District continues the examination arrangement from last year, setting 1-2 examination sites in each school district, with a total of 13 examination sites.The examination topics are divided into examination areas, and are divided into time periods by hours. On the day of the examination, students will enter the examination points in different examination areas according to the time periods. The list of students who have passed the examination will be announced online by the Regional Education Admissions Examination Center on May 23rd, and students can check their examination results online."

translation1: "The main stream of the Yangtze River has achieved full coverage of water-based green comprehensive service areas - Xinhua News Agency, Xinhua News Agency, Wuhan, December 11 (Reporter Wang Hui) The water-based green comprehensive service area in Shuicheng, Chongqing, was officially put into operation on the 10th, which is the second water-based green comprehensive service area in the upper reaches of the Yangtze River to officially operate after the water-based green comprehensive service area in Luzhou, Sichuan Province was officially put into operation on the 8th. With this, the water-based green comprehensive service areas have been covered in the upper, middle, and lower reaches of the Yangtze River.The deputy director of the Changjiang Navigation Management Bureau of the Ministry of Transport introduced that previously, provinces such as Hubei, Hunan, Jiangxi, Anhui, and Jiangsu had built and put into operation 10 waterway green comprehensive service areas in the middle and lower reaches of the Yangtze River, which have been widely recognized by sailors and played an important role in promoting the high-quality development of Yangtze River navigation. The establishment of waterway green comprehensive service areas is another milestone in the construction of Yangtze River green shipping, and the reception of ship pollutants and the service capacity of navigation have been significantly improved. According to the introduction, the waterway green comprehensive service areas are facilities that provide comprehensive production and living services for sailors and sailors, and are an important facility for helping sailors solve their \"urgent worries and longing\" problems.The two water-based green comprehensive service areas established this time on the upper reaches of the Yangtze River integrate life services, production services, and government services as one, with green environmental protection as the main theme and ship repair and emergency rescue services as the highlight. They will achieve the \"one-stop docking, multiple services\" for ships in the port area, making it more efficient and convenient for sailors who have been navigating the Yangtze River for many years."

translation1: "What is the way to drink Johnnie Walker Red Label? Everyone's hobbies are different, some people like to collect, some people like to enjoy food, of course, there are also people who like to appreciate wine. Johnnie Walker Red Label is currently one of the best-selling Scotch whiskies in various countries, and it has also won a gold medal at the International Wine and Spirits Competition. Each bottle of Johnnie Walker Red Label has a unique taste, but if you don't know how to appreciate it, wouldn't you be wasting its aroma and taste?How to drink Red Label Whisky? Here's a simple introduction from the author:  To enjoy Red Label Whisky, start by pouring a shot of the whisky into a glass. You can add a few ice cubes to cool it down if you prefer. Then, swirl the whisky gently in the glass to release its aroma. Take a small sip and savor the taste. You can also add a splash of water or a dash of mixer like soda or ginger ale to enhance the flavor. Remember to drink responsibly and in moderation.Johnnie Walker Red Label Scotch Whisky is made from a blend of about 35 Scottish whiskies, with a rich and traditional flavor of Scottish whisky, characterized by a rich and fragrant aroma with a hint of sweetness and smokiness. On the palate, it is rich and refreshing with a hint of mint and a strong smoky malt flavor. This whisky can be enjoyed straight over ice or mixed with your favorite drink.Johnnie Walker whisky has entered the Chinese market, and to cater to the tastes of the Chinese people, Johnnie Walker whisky + Coca-Cola or Sprite or other fizzy drinks have become a timeless fashion. These sweet drinks not only neutralize the sourness, but also visually bring pleasure to people, and when added to the drink, they have the effect of changing the taste of the whisky. The most authentic and traditional way to drink Johnnie Walker whisky is with slices of orange and sugar (sand sugar is also possible).The authentic red label whiskey has a slightly sour taste, adding sugar can neutralize its acidity, and lemon can bring a refreshing aroma to the drink. Of course, the sweet and sour taste can be adjusted according to personal taste preferences. The three methods mentioned above are the best ways to enjoy red label whiskey, and everyone can try them as a reference. I hope my introduction can help everyone."
gpt_response: { "Fluency": { "Score": "5", "Explanation": "The text is highly fluent. It has no grammatical errors or unnatural wording, and the syntax perfectly flows in an easy-to-follow manner. All points are clearly articulated, and the structure of the content is on point. The sentences do not contain any awkward phrases, the tense is consistent, and there are no spelling mistakes. The context is clear all through." } }

translation1: "The curator of the China Sand Museum collaborated with the Saudi Arabian government to hold the first Contemporary Art Biennale in Saudi Arabia - Xinhua News Agency, Xinhua Net, December 12 (Reporters: Wang Hai Zhou, Hu Jun) The first Contemporary Art Biennale in Saudi Arabia - the Diriyah Contemporary Art Biennale, was officially opened to the public on the 11th in the Diriyah JAX Art District in the northwest of the Saudi capital Riyadh. A total of 64 artists from Saudi Arabia and China participated in the biennale. The biennale was co-curated by the Diriyah Contemporary Art Biennale Foundation in Saudi Arabia and the UCCA Center for Contemporary Art in China, with the director of the UCCA Center for Contemporary Art, Yan Xiaoyu, serving as the artistic director.According to the curatorial team, the theme of this biennale is \"Touching Stones to Cross the River\", which metaphorically represents the reform strategies adopted during the social and economic transformation period and also reflects the current state of social and cultural development in Saudi Arabia. The biennale covers an area of nearly 12,000 square meters, with six interconnected buildings displaying works in six units: \"Touching Stones to Cross the River\", \"Inheritance as Experiment\", \"Edge Thinking\", \"Towards the Public\", \"Beautiful New World\", and \"On the Spirit of Art\". Among them, the works of 27 Saudi artists account for more than 40% of the total number of works, covering various forms such as painting, installation art, and performance art. The works of 12 Chinese artists are also highly regarded, with some artists using innovative ways to create with recycled materials, such as Ice using discarded materials to reconstruct a classic landscape painting in his \"Behind the Story Series: Endless Mountains and Rivers\" (2014).Diriyah Biennale Foundation CEO Bakri said he hoped this year's biennale could establish an international dialogue, giving global audiences the opportunity to understand Saudi Arabia's vibrant cultural and creative industries and creative communities, and enhancing interaction. Tian Feiyu said: \"The goal of the biennale is double, on the one hand, it allows contemporary Saudi art to participate in the global dialogue, on the other hand, it allows Saudi audiences to immerse themselves in the world of contemporary art.\" It is understood that a series of lectures will be held during the opening period of the biennale, in which artists, curators, and opinion leaders in the creative industry will discuss topics such as cross-cultural exchange and the development of contemporary art."
gpt_response: { "Fluency": { "Score": "5", "Explanation": "The text is highly fluent in English - there are no grammatical errors, unnatural phrases, or stiff syntax. translation1: "In September 2020, Mr. Lu learned about a factory in Yuejia Town, Zhejiang through a real estate agent. After several on-site visits, Mr. Lu decided to purchase the factory. In December of the same year, Mr. Lu negotiated with the owner's family member, Lin, on the details of purchasing the factory and signed a \"Factory Purchase and Sale Deposit Agreement.\" The agreement stipulated that if the buyer did not want to buy the factory, the deposit of 200,000 yuan would be returned to the seller. If the seller did not want to sell the factory, the deposit would be doubled and returned to the seller. Both parties agreed to sign the factory purchase and sale contract within a week.However, after that, both parties failed to reach a consensus on key contract terms such as the scope of the factory's sale and the payment method, which led to the delay in signing the house purchase contract. Considering that both parties failed to reach an agreement on the content of the contract, a few days later, Mr. Lin refunded the 200,000 yuan deposit to Mr. Lu. Mr. Lu had prepared for the house purchase, including the deposit and the down payment, but the seller did not sign the contract, which made Mr. Lu helpless and angry.For this reason, Mr. Lu filed a lawsuit against Mr. Lin to the Yuyang Municipal People's Court. The court held that since both parties failed to sign a formal contract, it cannot be solely attributed to the defendant, and it should be reasonably presumed that the negotiation failed. Therefore, this case should not apply the penalty of double compensation for breach of contract, and the defendant does not need to bear the responsibility of returning double the deposit. After the first-instance judgment, the plaintiff appealed.Recently, the Second Circuit Court upheld the original judgment. [Lawyer's Reminder] In the transaction process, it is necessary to exercise due diligence. translation1: "Da Mei 360 Integrated Home Decoration Address: Huan Cheng Nan Lu 156 Hao Xing Fu Family Garden 12th Floor Initially, it was introduced by friends because of trust, so I chose to come and take a look. At the beginning, my budget was 70,000 yuan for basic decoration.As soon as I arrived at the store, a series of scams began. I was there for the first time just to show them my house plan, but they didn't even go to the site to measure the house. They could actually give me a quote saying that my 135 square meter house could be done for 70,000 yuan, and they didn't even know what brand of materials they were using. Their second scam was that you would have to pay the deposit as soon as you got to the store (and once you paid, you would never be able to get it back unless you had enough experience and could argue with them).When I was hesitating whether to pay the deposit, they would invite their so-called manager to tell you that if you pay the deposit today, we can give you a certain amount of discount. This is a big trap, and I am a living example of being cheated. When I was impulsive, I paid a deposit of more than 10,000 yuan. The quotation he gave me had many problems, 70,000 yuan did not include water and electricity renovation, did not include any doors and cabinets in the bathroom, and these three were the basic fees.Excluding their service fees, which are higher than those of other companies, I have lost trust in this company. They didn't explain anything clearly at the beginning and made me sign the contract. When I went to ask for a refund, they acted very experienced and had a dedicated team to deal with me.Regardless of how it ends up, it's the customer's problem and they are completely blameless. There are various ways to shift responsibility, and there are many details that I don't want to go into, it's all too sad. In short, don't choose them, because my friend's house that they did the decoration for also had poor quality, and they ended up charging various fees later on. It's a scam, they are just the head of the dragon decoration that originally deceived people, now they've changed their name and become something else.So don't choose such incompetent decoration companies. In the future, when choosing, please check these and inquire about them on Baidu because decoration is not cheap. If you want to ask the merchant, please log in or register first.Strictly prohibit the publication of various forms of merchant reviews, please see the merchant's statement for details. The Chongqing Decoration Design Channel provides you with the latest merchant information, including address, phone number, and business hours. Find a decoration company by browsing the public reviews on the platform."

The main tea-producing areas are promoting the integration of tea tourism, driving a large increase in income for tea farmers.The winds of fortune shift, and red tea is making a comeback. translation1: "Jiangxi will train 10,000 rural elementary school physical education teachers in the next three years-Xinhua Net Xinhua News Agency Nanchang May 22nd (Reporter Chen Yuxuan) According to a report from the Jiangxi Provincial Department of Education, in order to strengthen the shortage of subject teachers and ensure the balanced development of compulsory education in rural areas, since 2016, Jiangxi Province has planned to train 10,000 qualified music, art, and physical education teachers for primary schools in the entire province within three years. It is understood that the target of this training is for primary school teachers in rural areas of Jiangxi Province who are under 45 years old and have a basic knowledge or talent in music, art, and physical education. They can also serve as teachers of other subjects in addition to music, art, and physical education courses.Through training, they will master the basic knowledge and teaching skills of aesthetics education, update their teaching ideas and concepts, grasp modern teaching methods, improve their subject teaching ability, activity design ability, campus culture ability, and self-development ability, and build a team of versatile aesthetics educators to alleviate the problem of shortage of aesthetics educators in rural areas. To ensure the quality and effectiveness of the training, Jiangxi plans to train 100 primary school music, art, and physical education teachers in each of the 100 counties (cities, districts) in the province, a total of 3,000 trainees, comprehensively improving their teaching demonstration and leadership ability, teaching research activity design organization ability, training ability, and network training workshop construction ability, playing a teaching, demonstrating, guiding, and supervising role."

translation1: "The State Council's joint defense and joint control mechanism issued a document requiring strengthening the epidemic prevention and control of the novel coronavirus in port cities along the land border. It stipulates that persons who have recently left port cities along the land border (excluding those connected with Hong Kong and Macao) must present a negative nucleic acid test certificate within 48 hours, and persons traveling to port cities along the land border must undergo at least one nucleic acid test after arrival. The time range for this requirement is from the announcement of the port city scope by each province, district, and municipality to March 15, 2022.In addition, the notice also proposes that conditionally open ports can study setting epidemic prevention and control buffer zones within their jurisdictions. The person in charge of the National Health Commission's Disease Prevention and Control Agency introduced that for some port cities, cross-border trade is the main economic support, and the exchange between the two sides is frequent. By implementing differentiated management policies based on regions, a single line of epidemic prevention and control can become two lines of defense, which is expected to achieve the advance of the border epidemic prevention and control, reduce the spread of the epidemic, and achieve the maximum effect of epidemic prevention and control with the minimum social impact and cost.Recently, there have been several local clustered outbreaks of COVID-19 in our country, all of which were imported from overseas through ports of entry. The above-mentioned notice pointed out that this exposes some problems such as insufficient and untimely epidemic monitoring and early warning in some localities, non-implementation of closed-loop management for high-risk personnel, formality of regular nucleic acid testing, inadequate disposal of cold-chain products at all links, irregular management of centralized isolation sites, and inadequate scientific and accurate emergency response to the epidemic. The notice requires efforts to be made in nine aspects, including improving the epidemic prevention and control mechanism in port cities, improving the epidemic monitoring and early warning system, implementing border control measures, and strengthening the weak links in port city epidemic prevention and control, to scientifically and accurately carry out epidemic prevention and control work and tighten the external prevention and control line.The notice emphasizes that cities at ports of entry should synchronize the research and deployment of epidemic prevention and civilian livelihood protection work, publicize and open up civilian livelihood protection hotlines, regularly identify potential risks in the supply of basic life necessities and prices, and actively respond to and solve prominent problems reflected by the public. According to the notice, the aforementioned port cities include counties (cities, districts, banners) where land, water, and air ports are located, as well as the cities (prefectures, states, leagues) and directly administered municipalities where they are situated. The specific scope will be determined by each province (autonomous region, directly administered municipality) based on the needs of epidemic prevention and control and announced in a timely manner."

translation1: "More than 130 Asian American organizations in the US submitted a complaint to the US Department of Education and the Justice Department on May 23, accusing three Ivy League schools - Yale University, Brown University, and Dartmouth College - of discriminating against Asian American applicants in their admission process. The Asian American Education Alliance, which led the complaint, held a press conference in Washington on the same day. - Xu Jianmei, Xinhua News Agency, Washington, May 23rd.The chairman of the organization, Zhao Yu Kong, said at a press conference that in the past 10 years, the number of Asian applicants who meet the admission requirements of top American universities has increased many times over, but the proportion of Asians in these three top American universities has remained at the same level. Many studies have shown that these universities have systematically and persistently discriminated against Asian applicants in their so-called \"holistic\" admission process. Zhao Yu Kong introduced that a study by Sanders et al. in 2014 showed that among these three universities, the acceptance rate of Asians was the lowest compared to the number of applicants of all ethnicities.According to data from the US Department of Education, among all Ivy League schools, Brown University and Dartmouth College have the lowest admission rates for Asian-American students. Yale University and Brown University have implemented de facto racial quotas for Asian-American applicants for more than 20 years. Zhu Yu told Xinhua News Agency reporters that they hope to submit a lawsuit and urge the US Department of Education and the Department of Justice to investigate and take measures to prevent these universities from continuing to discriminate against Asian-Americans in recruitment. They also hope that the universities being sued will take the issue seriously and change their admission policies towards Asian-Americans.Currently, the three colleges that have been complained about have not yet responded. The Asian American Education Alliance was established in 2015, at which time it filed a complaint against Harvard University for discrimination in admissions, but the US Department of Education did not accept it due to procedural reasons. In addition to American Chinese organizations, this time's appeal also includes Indian, Korean, Japanese, and Pakistani American educational organizations."

translation1: "The joint military exercise \"Peace Rescue-2021\" between China and Vietnam, which involved logistics support, successfully concluded on December 12. The Chinese team participating in the exercise safely returned to Guangxi, China, marking the successful completion of the 7-day exercise mission. This exercise focused on the important topic of humanitarian medical rescue, with both armies adhering to the mission of saving lives and providing aid. They completed joint logistics command, joint on-site rescue, and large-scale casualty treatment according to real combat standards, effectively enhancing the logistics support capabilities of both armies.The results of the exercise have been recognized by both the Chinese and Vietnamese armies. The head of the Vietnamese exercise guidance committee, Deputy Chief of Staff of the Vietnamese People's Army Logistics Department and Chief of Staff of the Vietnamese People's Army General Staff, Nguyen Tien Su, said at the closing ceremony of the exercise that through this exercise, the Vietnamese military doctors learned about the organization and professional activities of the Chinese military doctors, as well as the medical and protective equipment of the Chinese side. The achievements of the exercise demonstrate the professional capabilities of the military medical forces of both countries in the fields of medical assistance and epidemic prevention and control.The Chinese side, led by the head of the coordination group and the vice director of the Logistics Support Department of the Central Military Commission's Health Bureau, Chen Chunming, stated that this exercise is another innovative practice built on the successful holding of the joint medical examination activity in 2018, and it has great significance as a milestone. During the exercise, the Chinese People's Liberation Army donated medical protective masks, medical protective clothing, and rapid nucleic acid testing instruments to the Vietnamese People's Army for epidemic prevention and control."
